## art list

List files of a commit

```
art list [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # List files for the latest version
  art list

  # List files for the specific version
  art list v1.0.0
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for list
```

### SEE ALSO

* [art](art.md)	 - AritV is a version control system for large files
